Elie's shoes as much as you possibly can;
although it is painful for us to do and it's not
easy I want you to do that. That is why I am
teaching you this book. So try not to just read it
on the surface, put yourself in it, put yourself
in the role of Elie. That's what he wants you to
do, that's why it's first person! That's why he
is the protagonist and the survivor and the
author- it's all intentional. He wants you to
experience it as awful as you possibly can, so
that you know how bad it is. So we made a comment
yesterday, "no survivor could begin to tell a
spark of the flame of the story", right? So even
though we're never gonna understand it
completely or be able to put ourselves in the
shoes completely, put yourselves in his shoes
as much as you possibly can, because if you know
how bad it was and you're feeling these emotions
that Elie makes you feel, then you're not gonna
let something like this happen. Like I told you,
you guys are the future, you guys are gonna grow
up and you have to be the ones who don't hate, who
don't discriminate, those of you- you guys all
have to be the ones who are accepting of tolerant
and teach your friends and your children those
things so that nothing like this ever happens
again. So I caution you from just reading this on

<text text-anchor="start" x="13430" y="-1190.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> He doesn't want to make a mistake and ask the</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="13490.5" y="-1042.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 69 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13519" y="-1027.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">CHALLENGE</text>
<polygon fill="mediumseagreen" stroke="none" points="13411,-856 13411,-1018 13709,-1018 13709,-856 13411,-856"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13436" y="-1000.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I don't think it’s necessarily about asking the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13456.5" y="-985.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> wrong questions, but asking the right</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13436" y="-970.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> questions to get the right answers. like that’s</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13439.5" y="-955.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> what makes it so dramatic. Seeing all these</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13441.5" y="-940.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> things that he saw, I think he's questioning</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13436.5" y="-925.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> everything and that includes his religion and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13433" y="-910.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> because he doesn't believe and because you're</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13435" y="-895.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> not supposed to question he's struggling with</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13417" y="-880.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> that and he wants to ask why but he doesn't want to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13441.5" y="-865.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> go against his religion, go against himself.</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="13410,-1018 13410,-1018 13710,-1018 13710,-1018 13410,-1018"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="13410,-855 13410,-1061 13710,-1061 13710,-855 13410,-855"/>

<g id="node104" class="node"><title>71</title>

<text text-anchor="start" x="13487.5" y="-792.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 71 - STUDENT 19</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13522" y="-777.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="none" points="13414,-620.5 13414,-767.5 13706,-767.5 13706,-620.5 13414,-620.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13450" y="-750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I think that it's not unnatural- forgetting</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13432.5" y="-735.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> about the holocaust like just as a normal teen.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13439.5" y="-720.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Like they question a lot about their life and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13440" y="-705.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> what they've been taught, so I don't believe</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13427.5" y="-690.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> questioning his god was wrong for him to do, it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13433" y="-675.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> was more natural for him to do, but given the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13441" y="-660.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> situation with the holocaust too, I think it's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13420" y="-645.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> even more apparent for him to question the god as</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13546" y="-630.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> well</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="13413,-767.5 13413,-767.5 13707,-767.5 13707,-767.5 13413,-767.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="13413,-620 13413,-811 13707,-811 13707,-620 13413,-620"/>

<text text-anchor="start" x="13491" y="-557.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 72 - STUDENT 5</text>

<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="none" points="13419,-415.5 13419,-532.5 13702,-532.5 13702,-415.5 13419,-415.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13436.5" y="-515.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I think him questioning his god really shows</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="13434" y="-485.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> he was so religious he didn't want to question</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13441" y="-470.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> anything but once it was happening he was</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13446" y="-455.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> questioning it. In the introduction he was</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13436" y="-440.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> almost losing faith because of how terrible it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13552" y="-425.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> is.</text>

<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="none" points="13250,-328 13250,-370 13548,-370 13548,-328 13250,-328"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13326.5" y="-352.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 73 - STUDENT 27</text>

<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="none" points="13250,-226 13250,-328 13548,-328 13548,-226 13250,-226"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13287.5" y="-310.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I think he's questioning it all because he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13256" y="-295.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> believes that God would not do him wrong and that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13269" y="-280.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> everything that he's giving is for a purpose and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13268.5" y="-265.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> that's what God has sent him through. It's what</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13289" y="-250.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> he's putting him through, but he doesn't</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13271" y="-235.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> understand why he's putting him through that.</text>

<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="none" points="13421,-28.5 13421,-130.5 13704,-130.5 13704,-28.5 13421,-28.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13427" y="-113.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I think when you spend your life living one way,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13445.5" y="-98.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> believing in all the things that you believe</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13427" y="-83.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> since a young age especially for his age when he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13436.5" y="-68.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> was twelve to fifteen, He definitely questions</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13437" y="-53.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> all his faith that he's learned towards the end,</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="13590" y="-310.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I was just going to say, going off of Student 27</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13607" y="-295.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> and Student 5, if you puts yourself in the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13599" y="-280.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> situation, it's more understandable why he'd</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13600.5" y="-265.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> lose belief because he'd been treated poorly</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="13167" y="-162.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 77 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13198.5" y="-147.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="none" points="13088,-20.5 13088,-137.5 13385,-137.5 13385,-20.5 13088,-20.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13094" y="-120.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I think it was hard for him to even think about how</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="13095.5" y="-105.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> his God was, who created him, who created all the</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="16903" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I don't know how much we can relate to Elie and I</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="16776" y="-2145.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I would say that I think you're right, it's very</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="16767.5" y="-2085.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> aspect that you can relate to, I think he was just</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16770.5" y="-2070.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> crying to get across, there's always going to be</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16763" y="-2055.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> pure evil and pure good in the world, this is what</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16781" y="-2040.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> pure evil can do, I think that's what he was</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16788.5" y="-2025.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> trying to relate to us. Because that's still</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16812" y="-2010.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> everywhere in our world today.</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="16763" y="-1872.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Going off what Student 16 and Student 19 said: we</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="16771" y="-1827.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> and evil, like Duncan said, does happen, and we</text>

<polygon fill="tomato" stroke="none" points="18217,-2688.5 18217,-2790.5 18489,-2790.5 18489,-2688.5 18217,-2688.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18242.5" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Backing up all three of them, I feel like</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18226.5" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> different people, what you've been through in</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18223" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> your life through personal experiences you can</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18226" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> relate to some of this stuff but its never going</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18229.5" y="-2713.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> to be to the certain level that someone like a</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18255" y="-2698.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> survivor would be able to relate to.</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="18216,-2790.5 18216,-2790.5 18490,-2790.5 18490,-2790.5 18216,-2790.5"/>

<g id="node125" class="node"><title>88</title>
<polygon fill="mediumseagreen" stroke="none" points="18220,-2345.5 18220,-2387.5 18491,-2387.5 18491,-2345.5 18220,-2345.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18283" y="-2370.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 88 - STUDENT 19</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18314.5" y="-2355.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">CHALLENGE</text>
<polygon fill="mediumseagreen" stroke="none" points="18220,-2273.5 18220,-2345.5 18491,-2345.5 18491,-2273.5 18220,-2273.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18234" y="-2328.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I don't think it's the fact that we can or can't</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18226" y="-2313.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> relate to it, I think it's more that he needs us to</text>

<g id="node126" class="node"><title>91</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="none" points="18209,-2148 18209,-2190 18507,-2190 18507,-2148 18209,-2148"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18288.5" y="-2172.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 91 - STUDENT 5</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18320" y="-2157.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="none" points="18209,-2016 18209,-2148 18507,-2148 18507,-2016 18209,-2016"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18234" y="-2130.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I think we partially can relate, because when</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18223" y="-2115.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> this was happening, the author was a similar age</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18242" y="-2100.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> to us and there's still shootings and things</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18238" y="-2085.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> happening that show us all the bad that can</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18226" y="-2070.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> happen and I think that the main purpose of the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18215" y="-2055.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> story is to show us what can happen if we don't pay</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18239" y="-2040.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> attention to the outside world or see what's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18281" y="-2025.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> happening and try to stop...</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="18208,-2148 18208,-2148 18508,-2148 18508,-2148 18208,-2148"/>

<text text-anchor="start" x="18288.5" y="-1937.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 92 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18320" y="-1922.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="none" points="18211,-1751 18211,-1913 18505,-1913 18505,-1751 18211,-1751"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18217" y="-1895.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Going back to what Student 5 and Student __ said,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18225.5" y="-1880.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I think that if we try to relate we’re minimizing</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18232.5" y="-1865.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> it almost, because there's nothing in our lives</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18226.5" y="-1850.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> that we really have seen ourselves or been in in</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18239" y="-1835.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> those situations that can be like that. And I</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18239.5" y="-1820.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> think because what Student 5 said "he was</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18241" y="-1805.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> someone our age", I think by showing the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18238" y="-1790.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> difference between our lives and their lives</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18224.5" y="-1775.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> and showing that things that happened, they can</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18334.5" y="-1760.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> happen.</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="18210,-1913 18210,-1913 18506,-1913 18506,-1913 18210,-1913"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="18210,-1750 18210,-1956 18506,-1956 18506,-1750 18210,-1750"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="18289" y="-1687.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 94 - STUDENT 9</text>

<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="none" points="18214,-1545.5 18214,-1662.5 18503,-1662.5 18503,-1545.5 18214,-1545.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18265" y="-1645.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I think there's a different between</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18247" y="-1630.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> relatability back to our lives and putting</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18255" y="-1615.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> ourselves in their shoes. I think that's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18220" y="-1600.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> something we all need to do and try to experience</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18259" y="-1585.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> the emotions behind it, but we can't</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18235.5" y="-1570.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> necessarily connect that to what we're living</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18230" y="-1555.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> day to day, I mean that's completely different.</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="18967" y="-2800.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 90 - STUDENT 8</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19020.5" y="-2785.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="tomato" stroke="none" points="18894,-2703.5 18894,-2775.5 19179,-2775.5 19179,-2703.5 18894,-2703.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18900" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Going off what Student 19 said, I don't think you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18913" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> need to be able to relate to it, I jus think you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18905" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> need to be able to hear it, because its important</text>

<!-- 93 -->
<g id="node130" class="node"><title>93</title>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="18549,-3037.5 18549,-3064.5 18858,-3064.5 18858,-3037.5 18549,-3037.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18639" y="-3047.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 93 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="18549,-2455.5 18549,-3037.5 18858,-3037.5 18858,-2455.5 18549,-2455.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18568.5" y="-3020.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I see a lot of connection in what you're saying to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18610" y="-3005.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> the way we read fiction. We read</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18592.5" y="-2990.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> fiction..."Yep, that's a story, whatever",</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18573" y="-2975.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> but I caution you against reading this that way.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18566.5" y="-2960.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I want you to relate, I want you to put yourself in</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18588" y="-2945.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Elie's shoes as much as you possibly can;</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18580" y="-2930.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> although it is painful for us to do and it's not</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18580" y="-2915.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> easy I want you to do that. That is why I am</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18571" y="-2900.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> teaching you this book. So try not to just read it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18577.5" y="-2885.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> on the surface, put yourself in it, put yourself</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18573.5" y="-2870.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> in the role of Elie. That's what he wants you to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18579.5" y="-2855.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> do, that's why it's first person! That's why he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18586.5" y="-2840.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> is the protagonist and the survivor and the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18584.5" y="-2825.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> author- it's all intentional. He wants you to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18577" y="-2810.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> experience it as awful as you possibly can, so</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18555" y="-2795.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> that you know how bad it is. So we made a comment</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18581.5" y="-2780.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> yesterday, "no survivor could begin to tell a</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18572.5" y="-2765.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> spark of the flame of the story", right? So even</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18594" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> though we're never gonna understand it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18580" y="-2735.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> completely or be able to put ourselves in the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18577" y="-2720.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> shoes completely, put yourselves in his shoes</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18563.5" y="-2705.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> as much as you possibly can, because if you know</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18566.5" y="-2690.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> how bad it was and you're feeling these emotions</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18572.5" y="-2675.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> that Elie makes you feel, then you're not gonna</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18572.5" y="-2660.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> let something like this happen. Like I told you,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18565.5" y="-2645.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> you guys are the future, you guys are gonna grow</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18559.5" y="-2630.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> up and you have to be the ones who don't hate, who</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18577.5" y="-2615.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> don't discriminate, those of you- you guys all</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18567.5" y="-2600.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> have to be the ones who are accepting of tolerant</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18574.5" y="-2585.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> and teach your friends and your children those</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18581.5" y="-2570.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> things so that nothing like this ever happens</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18568.5" y="-2555.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> again. So I caution you from just reading this on</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18582" y="-2540.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> the surface. Read this deeper than any book</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18585.5" y="-2525.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> you've read and will read this year and put</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18582.5" y="-2510.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> yourself in his shoes, relate as much as you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18588" y="-2495.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> possibly can. Any comments, there? Any</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18581.5" y="-2480.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> questions, there? Do you think it's gonna be</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18670.5" y="-2465.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> hard to do?</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="18548,-3037.5 18548,-3037.5 18859,-3037.5 18859,-3037.5 18548,-3037.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="18547.5,-2455 18547.5,-3066 18858.5,-3066 18858.5,-2455 18547.5,-2455"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="21558.5" y="-1895.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I think with an event like the holocaust, it's</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="21217" y="-1638.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Not a lot of people can say that they survived the</text>

<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="none" points="21272,-1310.5 21272,-1457.5 21566,-1457.5 21566,-1310.5 21272,-1310.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21297" y="-1440.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I think religion's only part of it. I feel like if</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21278" y="-1425.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I was going to do something like that, you know, I</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="21294.5" y="-1395.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> can't actually put my life in there. I feel like,</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="21288" y="-1350.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> to think about it, I think you would just kind of</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="21437" y="-1205.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> After, to try to practice your religion, it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21410" y="-1190.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> would be hard because it would put flashbacks in</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="21491" y="-985.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I think one of the things a situation like this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21476" y="-970.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> would change a person, but I don't think it would</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="21488.5" y="-940.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> religion, because you can't blame everything</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21487" y="-925.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> on your God. This isn't their fault, bad things</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21478.5" y="-910.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> do happen in the world, obviously, but you can't</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21486.5" y="-895.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> just blame it all on your religion and just like</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="21935" y="-2807.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 108 - STUDENT 27</text>

<polygon fill="tomato" stroke="none" points="21868,-2695.5 21868,-2782.5 22154,-2782.5 22154,-2695.5 21868,-2695.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21877" y="-2765.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Going off what Student 18 said, religion is what</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21883.5" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> kept these people living, because they had the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21888.5" y="-2735.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> right to pray even if- it wasn't allowed but it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21874" y="-2720.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> was still keeping hope alive and hope that maybe</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21922.5" y="-2705.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> they would survive and get out.</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="21867,-2782.5 21867,-2782.5 22155,-2782.5 22155,-2782.5 21867,-2782.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="21867,-2695 21867,-2826 22155,-2826 22155,-2695 21867,-2695"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="21971.5" y="-2370.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="none" points="21870,-2258.5 21870,-2360.5 22149,-2360.5 22149,-2258.5 21870,-2258.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21876" y="-2343.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Going off of what Student 27 said, when they're</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21903" y="-2328.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> taken away they're separate from their</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21881" y="-2313.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> families and everybody they know so the only</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21884" y="-2298.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> thing they have to rely on is their religion, so</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21883.5" y="-2283.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> that kind of helps them get through the tough</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21990.5" y="-2268.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> times.</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="21869,-2360.5 21869,-2360.5 22150,-2360.5 22150,-2360.5 21869,-2360.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="21868.5,-2257.5 21868.5,-2403.5 22149.5,-2403.5 22149.5,-2257.5 21868.5,-2257.5"/>
</g>

<!-- 110 -->
<g id="node146" class="node"><title>110</title>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="22184,-2125 22184,-2152 22475,-2152 22475,-2125 22184,-2125"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22261.5" y="-2134.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 110 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="22184,-2053 22184,-2125 22475,-2125 22475,-2053 22184,-2053"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22190" y="-2107.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Could a person recover when he lost his faith. We</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22203" y="-2092.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> know that one of the big themes of the text is</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22201" y="-2077.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> maintaining faith, so could a person recover if</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22270.5" y="-2062.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> he did lose his faith?</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="22183,-2125 22183,-2125 22476,-2125 22476,-2125 22183,-2125"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="22182.5,-2052.5 22182.5,-2153.5 22475.5,-2153.5 22475.5,-2052.5 22182.5,-2052.5"/>
</g>
<!-- 112 -->
<g id="node147" class="node"><title>112</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="none" points="21868,-2133 21868,-2175 22148,-2175 22148,-2133 21868,-2133"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21932" y="-2157.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 112 - STUDENT 12</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21970" y="-2142.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="none" points="21868,-2031 21868,-2133 22148,-2133 22148,-2031 21868,-2031"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21878.5" y="-2115.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Going off of what Student 19 said, many Jews</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21892" y="-2100.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> probably steered away from being Jewish</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21898" y="-2085.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> because that's what got them into being</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21874" y="-2070.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> discriminated by Nazis. So, they could have run</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21880" y="-2055.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> away from it, but also come steered back to it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21983.5" y="-2040.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> later on.</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="21867,-2133 21867,-2133 22149,-2133 22149,-2133 21867,-2133"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="21867,-2030 21867,-2176 22149,-2176 22149,-2030 21867,-2030"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="19947.5" y="-2815.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 111 - STUDENT 19</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20007.5" y="-2800.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="tomato" stroke="none" points="19883,-2688.5 19883,-2790.5 20164,-2790.5 20164,-2688.5 19883,-2688.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19896" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I think that you can, because there's examples</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19889" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> where, say, a person loses a family member and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19901.5" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> entirely loses their faith because they blame</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19896" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> it on their god. And ten years later they'll turn</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19906.5" y="-2713.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> back to it through some kind of event that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19997.5" y="-2698.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> happens.</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="19882,-2790.5 19882,-2790.5 20165,-2790.5 20165,-2790.5 19882,-2790.5"/>

</g>

<!-- 114 -->
<g id="node149" class="node"><title>114</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="none" points="19556,-3213 19556,-3255 19837,-3255 19837,-3213 19556,-3213"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19624" y="-3237.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 114 - STUDENT 5</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19658.5" y="-3222.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="none" points="19556,-3111 19556,-3213 19837,-3213 19837,-3111 19556,-3111"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19565.5" y="-3195.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I think he's trying to show that, because he was</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19567.5" y="-3180.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> so religious and he lost his faith, it shows how</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19562" y="-3165.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> traumatic it was, because it was bad enough that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19570" y="-3150.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> someone who's so deeply religious could lose</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19566.5" y="-3135.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> their faith. It would take a very bad experience</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19644" y="-3120.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> for that to happen.</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="19555,-3213 19555,-3213 19838,-3213 19838,-3213 19555,-3213"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="19554.5,-3110 19554.5,-3256 19837.5,-3256 19837.5,-3110 19554.5,-3110"/>
</g>

<!-- 115 -->
<g id="node150" class="node"><title>115</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="none" points="19546,-2820.5 19546,-2862.5 19847,-2862.5 19847,-2820.5 19546,-2820.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19620.5" y="-2845.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 115 - STUDENT 27</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19658.5" y="-2830.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="none" points="19546,-2658.5 19546,-2820.5 19847,-2820.5 19847,-2658.5 19546,-2658.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19553.5" y="-2803.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Going off of what Student 5 said, for him to be one</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19565.5" y="-2788.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> of the most religious people and pray everyday</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19552" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> and go to the place where he did pray and go and- it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19558" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> just shows you how traumatic and how hard of an</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19567" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> experience it was for all the Jewish people and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19581.5" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> all the people that were religious that lost</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19582" y="-2713.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> their religion and lost their faith, that this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19578" y="-2698.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> was probably the worst thing that had ever</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19581.5" y="-2683.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> happened and would ever happen, to him</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19665.5" y="-2668.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> especially.</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="19545,-2820.5 19545,-2820.5 19848,-2820.5 19848,-2820.5 19545,-2820.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="19544.5,-2657.5 19544.5,-2863.5 19847.5,-2863.5 19847.5,-2657.5 19544.5,-2657.5"/>
</g>

<!-- 113 -->
<g id="node151" class="node"><title>113</title>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="19239,-2775.5 19239,-2802.5 19510,-2802.5 19510,-2775.5 19239,-2775.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19306.5" y="-2785.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 113 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="19239,-2718.5 19239,-2775.5 19510,-2775.5 19510,-2718.5 19239,-2718.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19248" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Why does Elie show us that he, of all people,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19245" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> struggles to maintain his faith? What's want to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19339" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> prove to us?</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="19238,-2775.5 19238,-2775.5 19511,-2775.5 19511,-2775.5 19238,-2775.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="19237.5,-2717.5 19237.5,-2803.5 19510.5,-2803.5 19510.5,-2717.5 19237.5,-2717.5"/>
</g>
<!-- 116 -->
<g id="node152" class="node"><title>116</title>
<polygon fill="tomato" stroke="none" points="22517,-2790.5 22517,-2832.5 22800,-2832.5 22800,-2790.5 22517,-2790.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22582.5" y="-2815.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 116 - STUDENT 24</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22642.5" y="-2800.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="tomato" stroke="none" points="22517,-2688.5 22517,-2790.5 22800,-2790.5 22800,-2688.5 22517,-2688.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22530.5" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I think he had very high expectations for what</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22523" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> his God could provide for him, through how this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22533" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> terrible thing could happen to him. He thinks</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22529" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> that his God will get him through this or make</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22540.5" y="-2713.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> sure this is over, that's what he thinks. But</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22602.5" y="-2698.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> that doesn't happen.</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="22516,-2790.5 22516,-2790.5 22801,-2790.5 22801,-2790.5 22516,-2790.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="22515.5,-2687.5 22515.5,-2833.5 22800.5,-2833.5 22800.5,-2687.5 22515.5,-2687.5"/>
</g>

</g>
<!-- 117 -->
<g id="node153" class="node"><title>117</title>
<polygon fill="tomato" stroke="none" points="22860,-2797.5 22860,-2839.5 23134,-2839.5 23134,-2797.5 22860,-2797.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22924.5" y="-2822.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 117 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22981" y="-2807.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="tomato" stroke="none" points="22860,-2680.5 22860,-2797.5 23134,-2797.5 23134,-2680.5 22860,-2680.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22872" y="-2780.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I think it really shows that even the strongest</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22888.5" y="-2765.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> and most faithful still stumble and still</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22891.5" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> question and I think it's just natural to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22866" y="-2735.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> question when something so traumatic is going</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22872.5" y="-2720.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> on, but I think it also shows that you recover</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22886.5" y="-2705.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> from it, you can pull back, because you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22940.5" y="-2690.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> survived, you lived.</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="22859,-2797.5 22859,-2797.5 23135,-2797.5 23135,-2797.5 22859,-2797.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="22859,-2680 22859,-2841 23135,-2841 23135,-2680 22859,-2680"/>
</g>

<!-- 117--117 -->

</g>
<!-- 118 -->
<g id="node154" class="node"><title>118</title>
<polygon fill="tomato" stroke="none" points="23847,-2790.5 23847,-2832.5 24128,-2832.5 24128,-2790.5 23847,-2790.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23911.5" y="-2815.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 118 - STUDENT 16</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23971.5" y="-2800.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="tomato" stroke="none" points="23847,-2688.5 23847,-2790.5 24128,-2790.5 24128,-2688.5 23847,-2688.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23858" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Going back to what Student 27 said, I feel like</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23854" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> you'd be able to recover but you wouldn't be the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23853" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> same, this was always going to be a part of your</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23858.5" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> life, it's always going to be on your mind after</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23864" y="-2713.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> life. And it's always going to be part of your</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23964.5" y="-2698.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> history.</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="23846,-2790.5 23846,-2790.5 24129,-2790.5 24129,-2790.5 23846,-2790.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="23845.5,-2687.5 23845.5,-2833.5 24128.5,-2833.5 24128.5,-2687.5 23845.5,-2687.5"/>
</g>

</g>
<!-- 120 -->
<g id="node155" class="node"><title>120</title>
<polygon fill="white" stroke="none" points="23530,-2797.5 23530,-2839.5 23810,-2839.5 23810,-2797.5 23530,-2797.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23597.5" y="-2822.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 120 - STUDENT 5</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23655" y="-2807.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">NON</text>
<polygon fill="white" stroke="none" points="23530,-2680.5 23530,-2797.5 23810,-2797.5 23810,-2680.5 23530,-2680.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23543.5" y="-2780.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I have a question for chapter 2 for page 24. It</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23536" y="-2765.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> says that in exchange for a gold watch they they</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23551.5" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> discovered that they'd be getting out of the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23542" y="-2735.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> labor camp, but then just a couple lines below</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23546" y="-2720.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> that it says that their confidence soared, why</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23538" y="-2705.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> do you think their confidence soared when they</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23537.5" y="-2690.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> really knew they were going to the labor camp?</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="23529,-2797.5 23529,-2797.5 23811,-2797.5 23811,-2797.5 23529,-2797.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="23529,-2680 23529,-2841 23811,-2841 23811,-2680 23529,-2680"/>
</g>
<!-- 119 -->
<g id="node156" class="node"><title>119</title>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="23195,-2857.5 23195,-2884.5 23494,-2884.5 23494,-2857.5 23195,-2857.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23276.5" y="-2867.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 119 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="23195,-2635.5 23195,-2857.5 23494,-2857.5 23494,-2635.5 23195,-2635.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23206" y="-2840.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> And remember why he includes this. He wants us</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23219.5" y="-2825.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> to- he has a choice of what's in this book, it's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23208.5" y="-2810.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> his experience, he can say whatever he wants, he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23201" y="-2795.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> includes this, so we know how bad it was. Even the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23225.5" y="-2780.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> most faithful of the faithful lost their faith,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23206.5" y="-2765.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> and therefore if we know that it was that bad then</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23216" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> we'll make sure nothing like this ever happens</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23209" y="-2735.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> again. It's all part of his goal. We know how bad</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23222.5" y="-2720.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> it was, even the faithful lost their faith, then</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23230" y="-2705.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> hopefully we'll learn from that. We'll see</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23206.5" y="-2690.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> "Wow! It must have been pretty bad", and not let</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23211.5" y="-2675.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> anything like this happen again. So I do want to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23219.5" y="-2660.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> talk about chapter 2. Chapter 2 is interesting.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23210" y="-2645.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> What are your thoughts on chapter 2? Anything.</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="23194,-2857.5 23194,-2857.5 23495,-2857.5 23495,-2857.5 23194,-2857.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="23193.5,-2635 23193.5,-2886 23494.5,-2886 23494.5,-2635 23193.5,-2635"/>
</g>
<!-- 121 -->
<g id="node157" class="node"><title>121</title>

<text text-anchor="start" x="24582" y="-2800.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 121 - STUDENT 6</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24638.5" y="-2785.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="tomato" stroke="none" points="24520,-2703.5 24520,-2775.5 24789,-2775.5 24789,-2703.5 24520,-2703.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24527" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I think because it's better than going right to a</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24539" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> place where you're killed immediately, at</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24526" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> least you get to live a little bit longer or might</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24630.5" y="-2713.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> survive.</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="24519,-2775.5 24519,-2775.5 24790,-2775.5 24790,-2775.5 24519,-2775.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="24518.5,-2702.5 24518.5,-2818.5 24789.5,-2818.5 24789.5,-2702.5 24518.5,-2702.5"/>
</g>

<!-- 122 -->
<g id="node158" class="node"><title>122</title>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="24189,-2850.5 24189,-2877.5 24484,-2877.5 24484,-2850.5 24189,-2850.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24268.5" y="-2860.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 122 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="24189,-2643.5 24189,-2850.5 24484,-2850.5 24484,-2643.5 24189,-2643.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24201" y="-2833.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I don't think they knew. They didn't know. What</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24207.5" y="-2818.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> was happening at this time was unfathomable,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24208.5" y="-2803.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> nothing like this had ever happened before, so</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24212.5" y="-2788.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> they didn't know what being in a labor camp</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24202.5" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> meant. They just thought it meant "you're going</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24205.5" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> to do work for the war effort" and I think that's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24215.5" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> it and the other things they were thinking is</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24195" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> "The Germans are trying to keep us away from the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24207.5" y="-2713.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> war", but what is happening is unfathomable I</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24205.5" y="-2698.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> don't think they ever would have imagined that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24201" y="-2683.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> that's what they were going to do. So I think that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24207" y="-2668.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> answers your question. But it does seem- what</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24292.5" y="-2653.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> literary device?</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="24188,-2850.5 24188,-2850.5 24485,-2850.5 24485,-2850.5 24188,-2850.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="24187.5,-2642.5 24187.5,-2878.5 24484.5,-2878.5 24484.5,-2642.5 24187.5,-2642.5"/>
</g>

<g id="node160" class="node"><title>125</title>
<polygon fill="white" stroke="none" points="25171,-2775.5 25171,-2817.5 25477,-2817.5 25477,-2775.5 25171,-2775.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25251.5" y="-2800.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 125 - STUDENT 6</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25309" y="-2785.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">NON</text>
<polygon fill="white" stroke="none" points="25171,-2703.5 25171,-2775.5 25477,-2775.5 25477,-2703.5 25171,-2703.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25177" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I have a question. What would you do if you were in</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25196.5" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Elie's shoes about Madame Schachter and her</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="24855" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Ironic, yeah, it does seem ironic. So what do you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24858" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> think? Chapter 2! Madame Schachter! What the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24975" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> heck!</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="25798" y="-2822.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 126 - STUDENT 27</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25858" y="-2807.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="tomato" stroke="none" points="25731,-2680.5 25731,-2797.5 26017,-2797.5 26017,-2680.5 25731,-2680.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25740" y="-2780.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> If I was in Elie's shoes I would just have a lot of</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25753.5" y="-2765.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> wonder why she's doing that since he didn't</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25749" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> really know what's going on either, I felt that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25737" y="-2735.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> at that time and place that he would have thought</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25745.5" y="-2720.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> "I don't know why she's acting like this", that-</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25739.5" y="-2705.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> "what could we do to calm her down", but that's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25803" y="-2690.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> not what happened at all.</text>

<polygon fill="tomato" stroke="none" points="26386,-2782.5 26386,-2824.5 26660,-2824.5 26660,-2782.5 26386,-2782.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26450.5" y="-2807.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 127 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26507" y="-2792.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="tomato" stroke="none" points="26386,-2695.5 26386,-2782.5 26660,-2782.5 26660,-2695.5 26386,-2695.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26399.5" y="-2765.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I think it's easier to say someone's crazy and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26392" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> say they're mad than face the hard truth and try</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26405.5" y="-2735.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> to say "oh, that might be real" and it's just</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26392.5" y="-2720.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> easier to say "I don't know what they're talking</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26458" y="-2705.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> about. They're insane".</text>

<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="26077,-2703.5 26077,-2790.5 26350,-2790.5 26350,-2703.5 26077,-2703.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26083" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> What about the inhumanity that you see in this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26091" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> chapter? 'Cause this is just the start of it and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26102.5" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> these aren't even the Nazis. This is your</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26085.5" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> cultured people who we mentioned yesterday.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26120" y="-2713.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> What does Elie want to show us?</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="26076,-2790.5 26076,-2790.5 26351,-2790.5 26351,-2790.5 26076,-2790.5"/>

<polygon fill="tomato" stroke="none" points="27011,-2703.5 27011,-2775.5 27298,-2775.5 27298,-2703.5 27011,-2703.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27022.5" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Elie wants to show us even in the darkest hours</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27046" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> usually people won't act so savage, but</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27017" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> whenever worse comes to worse people just want</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27021" y="-2713.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> silence and want people to just leave him alone.</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="27010,-2775.5 27010,-2775.5 27299,-2775.5 27299,-2775.5 27010,-2775.5"/>
